Update Now and Have Fun:
1. Optimize guidance and game experience for new players
2. Weapon and equipments can be reused now.
3. Make it more easier

Hello Wasteland Survivors! Ready for the new update? Let’s continue our adventure and survive in wasteland.

Update Now and Have Fun:
1. Change the unlock level for some blueprint recipes.
2. We reduce recovery time for the injured lovely dog.

Hello Wasteland Survival fighters!

Update Now and Have Fun:
1. Fix game sound bug on your iPhone devices.
2. Optimize game experience.

Lots of craft and survival fun are waiting for you in Wasteland. Stay and Live for longer!

Hi Wasteland Survivors! Check out the big update and new feature for you!

Built, Craft, Hunt and Defeat zombies to Survive:
1. Congratulations! PVP is open for all survivors. Update and try the PVP feature from the headquarter in your own home.

Hello Wasteland Survivors! Ready for the new update?

Fight to protect your home land:
1. PVP is open now! Enter it from Plunder and plunder other survivors’ home and resources.
2. Fix the time count down bug and optimize the PVP feature .

Call all of Survivors on Wasteland!

1. Fix the bug-zombie’s corpses won’t disappear in Shelter 13.
2. Change game ICON and Screenshot.
3. Optimize game performance.
